casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Jordan COBB, III. No. 447P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. William L. Osteen, Jr., Greensboro, for Cobb. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of August 2005."
